item.description:
It's a last minute party! More events soon. Hope you can make it this weekend...

Let's get together and kick-off summer (even though its been such a cold week -- perhaps a hearty welcome to summer will help!)! We will start of the evening with cocktails and conversation and move into dancing as the evening progresses.

This event will be for several of Trish's meetups – a great chance to cross-pollinate! You never know what creativity, innovation and provocative thoughts can come from the mix of entrepreneurship, arts, sustainability, spirituality and eros! For those of you that are single – wear a sticker on your badge to show your interest in meeting other singles. Join us for some great company, stimulating conversation and some groovy moves!

Please Bring EITHER: Something significant to share such as a good bottle of wine, an appetizer or dessert (no chips or bread unless part of an appetizer please!) OR $10 to contribute towards the food and drink I will be providing. (If you are unable to contribute for financial reasons please come anyway.) :)

The city of Somerville has agreed to waive parking permits for the event in the area around my house. You can park anywhere there is a legal space (no fire hydrants, etc.). If you get a ticket let me know and Ill give you the email of the women that will take care of it for you.

Loose Schedule:

Conversation, Networking, General Schmoozing: 7-9pm

Dancing, Singing, Etc: 9-12am

Hanging out, Telling Jokes, Etc: 12am til….

Hope you can make it!

Feel free to call  413-320-3991 or email me if you have any questions.
item.name: Summer Kick-off Party
